categories: Category:Commission for the Preservation of the New Order organizations

nodes.text: The Outer Rim Node was a branch of the HoloNet News agency that was responsible for broadcasting in the Outer Rim region of the galaxy. By 3272 LY, Eris Harro was Bureau Chief of the Outer Rim Node. In that capacity, Harro worked in collaboration with Pollux Hax, head of the Galactic Empire's Ministry of Information.
